#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int t=1;
    while(1){
    	int n;
    	cin>>n;
    	if(n==0) break;
    	int a[n],x=0;
    	for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
    		cin>>a[i];
    		x+=a[i];
		}
		x/=n;
		int count=0;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
			if(a[i]>x) count+=a[i]-x;
		}
		cout<<"Set #"<<t<<endl<<"The minimum number of moves is "<<count<<".\n\n";
		t++;
	}
    return 0;
}
